page.title: 14Transport,Abermorddu & Area
page.content: {Railways:}Diesel powered freight and passenger trains run on the{Wrexham}to {Bidston}line, passing through the local station at Cefnybedd. There is an hourly service during the day from Monday to Friday. On weekends there are four trains daily. A survey of passengers at Cefnybedd station showed that the service was used mainly by adults going to work, by pupils going to Castell Alun School and by adults and children going to shop in Wrexham. {Bus Services:}The Crosville Company runs six services over this 12km. block. The D25,D27,D28 and D26 serve the villages of Abermorddu,Cymau and Ffrith carrying passengers on these Wrexham/Mold services. The D13 and D15 services carry passengers between Brymbo and Wrexham. Passengers travel mainly to work or to shop.
